params.tag_line: Desire for success should be higher than your fear of failure
params.about_text: Hi I am Ayushi.I am Computer Science Engineer.I am very passionate about my work and very determined towards my dream,and I believe along with the dream one should also pursue their hobbies in life,because hobbies are the one which helps us to live a joyful life.So I think every should encalaculate their interest in various things apart from work...And my interest lies in travelling to the new adventurous places,exploring myself and I like to express myself by writing down my amazing experiences through this blog.
